Detailed Description

cvmx_bts_pd_slice::_ctl

These registers control the operation of each PD bank.

The PD bank must be disabled when changing any of these configuration parameters (i.e., [ENABLE]=0). The PD bank should be enabled with a separate register write after updating the other parameters (i.e., perform one write to change the settings, and use a second write to enable the PD bank).
